vocabAttributes.description: A term in a controlled vocabulary.

vocab.description: The name of the controlled vocabulary.

vocabUri.description: The URI of the controlled vocabulary.

id.description: The ID of the item in the controlled vocabulary.

title: CMMStudy
description: This schema defines the format of the CMMStudy record type.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy abstract for the given language code.

abstract.description: An object containing an abstract in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'An abstract', 'no': 'Et sammendrag'}

accessClass.description: Class of availability of the research data.

associatedInstitutions.description: An array of Associated Institutions for this CMMStudy.

classIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of class/category within the classification system.

classifications.description: Topics(classifications) for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

code.description: The short name of the repository as defined in the CESSDA Vocabularies Service.

creators.description: A Collection of Creators(affiliation) eg "Ami Doe(University of DV)". Potentially in many translated languages

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A Collection of Creators(affiliation) translated in this language
Freetext description of possibilities to access data.

dataAccess.description: An object containing Freetext description of possibilities to access data. E.g. {'en': 'via web', 'no': 'Et via web'}.

dataAccessFreeTexts.description: A Collection of Data Access Free Texts descriptions for data collection, potentially translated in multiple languages

items.description: A Data Access Free Texts description for data collection.

dataAccessUrl.description: A URL where a user can navigate to access the data behind this study.

dataCollectionFreeTexts.description: A collection of data collection FreeTexts Dates, potentially translated in multiple languages

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A collection data collection FreeTexts for this given language

dataCollectionPeriodEnddate.description: A JSON date string in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2012-04-23T18:25:43.511Z. In future restrict to ["format": "date-time" or "date"]

dataCollectionPeriodStartdate.description: A JSON date string in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2012-04-23T18:25:43.511Z. In future restrict to ["format": "date-time" or "date"]

dataCollectionYear.description: A JSON date year string, e.g. 2012.

fileLanguages.description: An array of File Languages (standardised ISO) for this CMMStudy.

isActive.description: Is the record marked as deleted. If record is deleted this = false.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Keywords for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code

keywords.description: Keywords for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

lastModified.description: A JSON date string in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2012-04-23T18:25:43.511Z.

oaiIdentifier.description: The OAI identifier that is returned by the OAI-PMH repository.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Persistent Identifiers for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

pidStudies.description: Persistent Identifiers for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

publicationYear.description: Year of publication (by publisher) of the study (for citation) - [YYYY] or the whole [YYYY-MM-DD].

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy institution publishing the research data for the given language code.

publisher.description: An object containing Study Titles in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'An studyTitle', 'no': 'Et studyTitle'}.

relatedPublications.description: Related publications to this study. This may be present in multiple languages.

title.description: The title of the related publication

holdings.description: The URIs of the holdings of the related publication.

repositoryUrl.description: The URL of the repository as defined in the repository's configuration

samplingProcedureFreeTexts.description: Sampling procedures freeText description for data collection.

items.description: A Sampling procedure freeText description for data collection.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Countries for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

studyAreaCountries.description: Countries for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

studyNumber.description: A studyNumber that uniquely identifies the CMMStudy within the datacatalogue.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy study Url for the given language code.

studyUrl.description: An object containing CmmStudy Urls in various languages.

studyXmlSourceUrl.description: The Study's Full xml URL of the Service Provider's endpoint

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy studyTitle for the given language code.

titleStudy.description: An object containing Study Titles in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'An studyTitle', 'no': 'Et studyTitle'}.

typeOfModeOfCollections.description: A collection of description of the methods of data collection in Potentially many languages

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A collection of description of methods for this given language

typeOfSamplingProcedures.description: Sampling procedures used for data collection.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of timeDimensions for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

typeOfTimeMethods.description: Time Methods for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Analysis Units for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

unitTypes.description: Analysis Units for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

universe.description: The universes that the study belongs to. This may be present in multiple languages.

inclusion.description: The included group of this universe.

exclusion.description: The excluded group of this universe.
